hardness.minecraft:default: FLOAT: the time it takes to break this block with the fist or any tool not specified, default = 0
hardness.item_name: FLOAT: the time it takes to break this block with the item specified, default = 0

block states.gravity: BOOLEAN: if this block is affected by gravity, default = false
block states.burnability: STRING: if it's capable of burning it'll also burn up, unless the value is 'ever', 'no' (default) means cannot burn, 'yes' means can burn
block states.light: INTEGER: the amount of light this block produces, if negative reduces light coming through the block by that amount, default = 0

tool_damage.item_name: INTEGER: the amount of damage this item will get, when used to break this block

solid_faces.down: BOOLEAN: if this face can be used as support, default = true
solid_faces.up: BOOLEAN: if this face can be used as support, default = true
solid_faces.north: BOOLEAN: if this face can be used as support, default = true
solid_faces.south: BOOLEAN: if this face can be used as support, default = true
solid_faces.east: BOOLEAN: if this face can be used as support, default = true
solid_faces.west: BOOLEAN: if this face can be used as support, default = true

need_support.down: STRING: if this block needs support of a block here, empty if any solid faced block will suffice as support, negated if not needed (supports block states), can also be a list of strings
need_support.up: STRING: if this block needs support of a block here, empty if any solid faced block will suffice as support, negated if not needed (supports block states), can also be a list of strings
need_support.north: STRING: if this block needs support of a block here, empty if any solid faced block will suffice as support, negated if not needed (supports block states), can also be a list of strings
need_support.south: STRING: if this block needs support of a block here, empty if any solid faced block will suffice as support, negated if not needed (supports block states), can also be a list of strings
need_support.east: STRING: if this block needs support of a block here, empty if any solid faced block will suffice as support, negated if not needed (supports block states), can also be a list of strings
need_support.west: STRING: if this block needs support of a block here, empty if any solid faced block will suffice as support, negated if not needed (supports block states), can also be a list of strings

block states.resistence: FLOAT: how much explosion power it needs before getting destroyed, default = 0
block states.transparent: BOOLEAN: if this block is transparent (doesn't block redstone wire/doesn't provide power through the block/can have transparent textures), default = false
block states.solid: BOOLEAN: if this block is solid (taking damage when in your head when in the bounding box), default = true
block states.piston_push: STRING: wheather a piston can push this block; 'no' = not pushable, 'yes' = pushable, 'break' = breaks on push, 'sticky' = pulls other blocks with it too, default = 'yes'
block states.sticky_push: STRING: wheather another block that has this or piston_push set to sticky can push this block; 'no' = not pushable, 'yes' = pushable, 'break' = breaks on push, 'sticky' = pulls other blocks with it too, default = 'yes'
hitbox: COMPOUND: basically a server-side model to use to calculate the hitbox, default = from 0 0 0, to 16 16 16
boundingbox: COMPOUND: basically a server-side model to use to calculate the collision, default = from 0 0 0, to 16 16 16

sides: STRING: what sides of the block hurt, default = all, valid values: up, down, north, east, south, west
functions.source: STRING: the damage source, used in the death message

not_affects.air: INTEGER: how much air the entity has left
not_affects.fire_resistant: BOOLEAN: if this entity cannot be hurt by fire
not_affects.effect: STRING: effect that this entity has
not_affects.enchantment: STRING: enchantment that this entity has on it's gear
not_affects.sneaking: BOOLEAN: if the entity is sneaking
not_affects.flying: BOOLEAN: if the entity is flying
not_affects.inverse: BOOLEAN: wheather it should not be this

hitbox: COMPOUND: basically a server-side model to use to calculate the hitbox, default = from 0 0 0, to 16 16 16
boundingbox: COMPOUND: basically a server-side model to use to calculate the hitbox, default = from 0 0 0, to 16 16 16
functions.time: INTEGER: the time in ticks it takes for this box to extend

condition.entity_tag: STRING: an nbt tag and it's value
condition.open_gui: BOOLEAN: if the gui needs to be opened for this to happen

functions.amount: INTEGER: how much redstone power this block gives (number)
STRING: how much redstone power this block gives (black state key)
functions.type: STRING: the type of powering, strong, weak or activation

position.x: INTEGER: relative coordinates to the block
position.y: INTEGER: relative coordinates to the block
position.z: INTEGER: relative coordinates to the block

condition.entity_tag: STRING: an nbt tag and it's value
condition.open_gui: BOOLEAN: if the gui needs to be opened for this to happen

sides: STRING: what sides of the block effect entities, default = all, valid values: up, down, north, east, south, west
functions.effect: STRING: the effect the entities get: movement
functions.amount: FLOAT: hoe much this affects entities, for movement it's a percentage

not_affects.air: INTEGER: how much air the entity has left
not_affects.fire_resistant: BOOLEAN: if this entity cannot be hurt by fire
not_affects.effect: STRING: effect that this entity has
not_affects.enchantment: STRING: enchantment that this entity has on it's gear
not_affects.sneaking: BOOLEAN: if the entity is sneaking
not_affects.flying: BOOLEAN: if the entity is flying
not_affects.inverse: BOOLEAN: wheather it should not be this
